story:
ITALIANI cliccate qui per la pagina in ITALIANO

 

Sancta Sanctorum is a new urban fantasy comic set in an alternate/dystopic present Earth where the Saints themselves (the "original" Saint Nicholas, Saint Augustine himself etc.) awoke from the Holy Relics to fight against the swarming Demons from hell.

Inspired by “The Preacher”, “American Gods”, “Hellblazer”, the "Da Vinci Code", the “Dogma” movie and the "Saint Seiya" manga, this graphic novel faces strong themes like faith, religion and gives a new, modern, fast and furious view of some of the most important heroes in human history: the Saints.

Peter II Roman, Patriarch of the new church

 

Our main characters are not "perfect" Saints, but "imperfect" human sinners instead, who can wield the miracles hidden in the Holy Relics. They are called the Martyrs. The Saints of the new Church persecute the Martyrs as dangerous heretics and claim one of them is the Antichrist in disguise. The Martyrs on the other hand wish to stop the Patriarch from erasing all human sinners from the Earth along with Demons. Who's right? Who's wrong? Follow us and discover the truth behind many of Christianity myth mysteries...

The setting is inspired by a novel written by Gilbert Gallo (that would be me, guys!), artwork is provided by Michele d’Aloisio and script by Daniele Solfrini. If this all sounds like your cup of tea, read on and support our crusade!

 

The Dark Ones swarming on Earth

A few years ago on Earth suddenly appeared the Dark Ones: demonic creatures who craved human souls and flesh. In no time, they decimated the world’s population but, when all seemed lost, a young boy acquired directly from Heaven incredible powers. He appointed himself the Patriarch of the one faith, thus founding the New Church “Dei Invicti Operae”.

Guided by the word of God, the Patriarch awakened the spirits of the Saints from their Relics. The Holy Father guided his legions of Saints against the Dark Ones and, after years of relentless war, the forces of the Lord eventually triumphed. Today, life goes on under the guidance and control of the New Church, who wishes to exterminate all Demons and establish the "Kingdom of God" on Earth.

St. Augustine - Scourge of Heretics and slayer of Dark Ones

 

Alas, internal strife, heretical divisions and rebellion against the strict divine laws are on the agenda. To make matters worse, the Dark Ones, even if defeated, are still a concrete threat that the New Church wishes to eradicate once and for all. The Patriarch instituted an authoritarian theocracy where the Saints, supported by flocks of winged Chrismatics, maintain order and protect people from all enemies, whether external or internal to the Pontificate. The vast majority of the population is happy to live as the “Lord’s flock” and sees in the New Church the only hope against the Dark Ones.

There is also a different type of divine beings: the Martyrs. These powerful hybrids between a man and a Saint are human sinners (with all kind of human vices and flaws) who can wield the incredible powers of the Holy Relics.

Egil - keeper of St. George's relic

 

Forced to live as fugitives, they are hunted by the most branched and organized New Church  who has branded them as heretics.

 

Arian - keeper of St. Lucy's relic.

 

The Martyrs are the main characters of Sancta Sanctorum graphic novel. In this #1 issue called "The Rebel Saints", the story follows the young Taro, a reckless, naive but good-hearted boy, who unintentionally becomes a victim of the power games and the struggles between the New Church and the secret society called the “God’s Hand” who employs Martyrs to accomplish its own goals.

Taro - keeper of the Holy Shroud

 

Taro’s uncle, the bishop of Turin, who is a powerful member of the God’s Hand, replaces the Holy Shroud with a fake, wishing to hinder the Patriarch’s secret plan of destroying the human race and building a sinless world inhabited only by Saints. Alas, the patron saint of the city, St. John the Baptist, discovers the theft and sentences the bishop and his nephew Taro to be burned at the stakes. The Martyrs arrive just in time to save the day and witness the incredible miracle of Taro merging with the Holy Shroud, acquiring its great powers. This way, Taro will become a Martyr too, and his life will be forever changed.

 

Leo - keeper of St. Francis's relic.

 

In this troubled scenario will take place the epic deeds of the Martyrs: too divine to be mere humans, but too imperfect to be Saints. Persecuted by the New Church and tempted by the Dark Ones, Taro and his incredible friends will face difficult choices on the narrow line between good and evil, constantly testing their faith. Who among them is the Antichrist? Which side will they join? They have to decide quickly, the Armageddon is coming ...


CLICK HERE for more info on the Setting

 

 

  Enjoy a sneak peek of the comic's pages!

 

Young Taro is saved from the burning stakes by Leo, one of the Martyrs.

 

Using his metamorphosis powers, Leo fights against the Chrismatics.

 

Arian shoots alchemical bullets against the winged Chrismatic soldiers.

 

Suddenly, an uninvited Dark One appears and wreaks havoc on the square

 

We aim to create the first book of our graphic novel series. The more funds we will receive, the bigger the book will get and the more features it will have. Now, let's see in detail how many wonderful things you can get for your invaluable help:

 

THE EXCLUSIVE, BACKERS-ONLY COMIC BOOK

Sancta Sanctorum #1 - The Rebel Saints. Exclusive, backers-only cover. Artwork @Michele D'Aloisio

Get our awesome issue #1 comic book in an exclusive, backers-only digital version. This issue will include all stretch goals and will be available to BACKERS ONLY! Yes, 100% exclusive! There will be no way to get it after the campaign ends. Future customers will buy a comic with a different cover and without stretch goals in it.

The “base” form of this exclusive issue will contain 12 pages B&W. The more stretch goals we hit, the more pages (and goodies) it will feature and it will switcth from B&W to fully colored! Keep spreading the word and help us make this exclusive issue the biggest and most beautiful ever! The comic will be available either in English or Italian. Choose your preferred language and enjoy!

(Note: After the project is successfully funded, this reward will be available exclusively with a print-on-demand option. Estimated printing costs: 5.5 Euros / 6.2 US$. For more info see the “Important Print-on-Demand and Shipping Info” section below.)

 

Diplomas of ORDINATION

Congratulations! You are now a part of Sancta Sanctorum universe!

Our digital diplomas testify to the world your incredible efforts in supporting our campaign. Each diploma changes according to your donation (the more generous, the more important the diploma is). Show it to your friends or print it and hang it on a wall! The different “titles” you can achieve on a diploma are as follows:

- Blessed Citizen,

- Chrismatic

- Elite Chrismatic

- Blessed Gamer

Diplomas will be available in pdf format either in English or Italian. Choose your preferred language and we’ll deliver it to you digitally!

 

Thanks on TWITTER!

Hear the Angels singing your name from our Twitter account!

Hear the angels sing your name in the heavens! We will shout out to the winds our sincerest gratitude via our official Twitter account! Another cool way to show you our appreciation! Our thanks can be written either in English or Italian. Choose your preferred language and we’ll announce it for you!

 

More Comics!

Enjoy more comics from the creators of Sancta Sanctorum! Click on the names for more info.

The Game Rules & Xaulos: the Beginning

6 issues of Ash Airways

Note: These comics will be available in digital (PDF) format only.

 

INDULGENCES

Partial Indulgence - Gluttony

Everyone of us is a sinner… But if you support our project with great generosity, then His Supreme Holiness, the Patriarch, of the Dei Invicti Operae Church will be moved to bestow you a partial or a complete deliverance from all your sins, even the mortal ones. All you have to do is sincerely repent, by donating money to this project with all your heart and to ask for divine forgiveness. Depending on your generosity, you can get one or both of the following rewards:

- Partial Indulgence: Choose one Deadly Sin (pride, greed, lust, maliciousness, envy, gluttony, wrathfulness or slothfulness) and give us your full name. The Patriarch will issue you a partial indulgence that delivers you from all deadly sins of that kind committed so far.

- Complete (Plenary) Indulgence: The most generous ones will be awarded with a complete indulgence that cancels ALL sins committed so far.

Indulgences can be granted to you or to whomever you wish, making them a great present idea! Just provide us with the sinner’s name and the Patriarch will issue the Indulgence for her/him. Indulgences are issued in digital (pdf) format only, in English or Italian. Choose the language and we’ll deliver it to you digitally!

 

SKETCHBOOK of Sancta Sanctorum

An exclusive, backers-only sketchbook of the Sancta Sanctorum world.

 

Talking about secrets… Discover all “behind the scenes” of our wonderful comic. Sketches, inkings and much more await you in this book that gathers all the preparatory work to create this awesome project! Don’t miss ANYTHING about Sancta Sanctorum’s birth and development. This reward will be available to BACKERS ONLY! There is no way to way to get it after the campaign ends.

(Note: After the project is successfully funded, this reward will be available exclusively for backers for a print-on-demand option. Estimated printing costs: 13 Euros / 14.6 US$. For more info see the “Important Print-on-Demand and Shipping Info.” section below.)

 

HOLY CERTIFICATES

Get an exclusive description of your holy powers

To testify your great importance in the world of Sancta Sanctorum, His Supreme Holiness, the Patriarch, will personally issue a custom, specific certificate that describes your unique powers as a Saint, as a Martyr, as a member of the Hand of God, as the Patriarch himself or as the dreaded Antichrist!!! Send us a picture of your choice, choose your holy powers and we will do the rest, adding some Sancta Sanctorum flavor to the certificate to make it an incredible memento of your generosity and kindness and a shining example of virtue for all people. This is a unique and especially made piece, so be proud of it! There will be no other Holy Certificate like yours! Depending on your generosity, there are different ranks available:

- Saint

- Martyr

- Member of the Hand of God (limited to #5 backers only)

- Patriarch (limited to ONLY ONE backer).

- Antichrist (limited to ONLY ONE backer).

Holy certificates are issued in digital (pdf) format in English or Italian. Choose the language and we’ll deliver it to you digitally!

 

ARTBOOK of Sancta Sanctorum

An exclusive, backers-only artbook about the world of Sancta Sanctorum and beyond.

 

Enjoying Michele’s art is easy.Falling in love with it is unavoidable. In this precious art book Michele will share many of his most important drawings, which will captivate your eyes and dive deep into your emotions. Definitely a great piece of art. This reward will be available to BACKERS ONLY! No way to get it after the campaign ends.

(Note: After the project is successfully funded, this reward will be available exclusively for backers for a print-on-demand option. Estimated printing costs: 13 Euros / 14.6 US$. For more info see the “Important Print-on-Demand and Shipping Info.” section below.)

 

CONCEPT BOOK of Sancta Sanctorum

Many different points of view on the Sancta Sanctorum universe.

The world of Sancta Sanctorum inspired many talented artists all over the world. This book contains the best art pieces selected during the “Saint Contest”. It features many different point of views on the main characters, the Saints and on the project itself. Be ready to open your mind as well as your eyes to fully enjoy these masterpieces! Note: the concept book will be delivered in digital (PDF) format only.

 

Your HOLY CERTIFICATE on URBAN DICTIONARY

Urban Dictionary entry - Example

To reward your incredible generosity, we will create a page on Urban Dictionary where we will describe your awesome holy powers and miracles as a Saint/Martyr/Hand of God member or Patriarch. Everyone must know about your awesome powers and miracles! Be ready to be worshipped! This service is available in English and Italian. Choose your language and wait for notoriety! (Note: actual publication on the UD website depends on UD webmaster's final decisions, which we cannot influence).

 

FEATURED CHARACTER – Background

Featured Character  - Background example

Your dream of appearing in a comic finally becomes true! Your appearance will be discussed with the artist and we’ll do our best to meet your desires and expectations. Your character will appear in the back row (like the winged Chrismatics of this scene) and he’ll look good!

 

FEATURED CHARACTER – FRONT and CENTER

Featured Character  - Front and Center example

Your dream of becoming famous becomes true. You will be portrayed in the foreground of one of the comic’s scenes. Your appearance will be discussed with the artist and we’ll do our best to meet your desires and expectations. Your character will appear in the front (like one of these two characters). You’ll make a hell of an impression!

 

ORIGINAL, SIGNED PAGE

Original Page - Example

For all you comic collectors out there, this is your chance to own one of the original A3 pages of Sancta Sanctorum inked and signed by Michele d’Aloisio himself! First come, first serve, so don’t wait, else your favorite page could be already spoken for! If you cannot go and pick it up directly from Michele’s house don't’ worry,  we will ship worldwide and free of charge!

 

ORIGINAL, ON-DEMAND drawing by Michele d’Aloisio

One of Michele D'Aloisio commissioned masterpieces

To thank your incredibly generous donation, Michele will be available just for you to draw whatever you like (people, animals, saints, martyrs, landscapes etc.) in full color on A3 paper. If you cannot go and pick up the masterpiece directly from Michele’s house don't’ worry, we will ship worldwide and free of charge!

 

DEDICATION

 

This is a very special reward, available to Antichrist-level pledges only. We will dedicate the exclusive backers only. Issue  to you or to one person of your choice. Just tell us the name and we'll do our best to make a wonderful dedication. Choose wisely, this is the ultimate present for a person you care for.


The EXCLUSIVE TRIPTYCH

The stunning Triptych drawn by Michele d'Aloisio

This is the ultimate exclusive reward, available to Antichrist-level pledges only. You will receive the original triptych representing Dark Ones, Martyrs and Saints, signed by Michele D'Aloisio. Just add a nice frame and you will have a true masterpiece to hang on your favorite wall. No matter where you live, we will deliver it to you, free of charge.

 

HOLY NOVELS

Thanks to Acheron Book's support, we are proud to offer you a great selection of their best books of speculative fiction. All titles will be available in digital format only either in English or in Italian. Click on the names to learn more.

Eternal War - Armies of Saints

Demon Hunter Severian - Lady of the Night Gates

Poison Fairies - The Landfill War

 

Tabletop RPG Settings

Would you like to fight in first person against the Dark Ones? Or would you rather fight against the New Church? Try our tabletop Role-Playing settins inspired by the graphic novel! You and your friends will become the new Rebel Saints! Some are exclusive, backers-only rewards, so don't miss this chance to get them!  Click on the names to know more.

Both RPG settings will be availablein specific pledges and/or as ADD-ONs. Getting them as an add-on is easy:

Step 1: Choose a Perk and pay for it

Step 2: Go back to the homepage and select "Back it" from the main menu

Step 3: Enter the desired amount (15$, 1$ or 16$ for both rpgs)

Step 4: send an email to info@sanctasanctorumofficial where you explain which add-ons you want. 

Just add the following amounts to whatever pledge you like to get one (or BOTH!) of them:

- Adventurers! the Rebel Saints (PDF): add +1$ to any Pledge you like.

- Sancta Sanctorum RPG powered by Musha Shugyo (PDF) : add +15$ to any pledge you like.

An exclusive, backers-only setting for Adventurers! - Revised Edition

Live the thrilling tales of the Sancta Sanctorum setting in this 2 pages, fast and furious setting for "Adventurers! - Revised edition" ruleset. The perfect solution for gamers who want to immediately dive into the setting and explore the many mysteries of the New Church! (IMPORTANT NOTE: Adventurers! is a property of GRAmel. You need the Adventurers! - Revised Edition core book to play this setting).

 

 

Sancta Sanctorum RPG teaser - powered by Musha Shugyo

Our partner Acchiappasogni is proud to offer you a copy of Sancta Sanctorum rpg - Powered by Musha Shugyo. This rpg will allow you to become one of the Martyrs or one of the Saints (!) in a dystopian world plagued by the Dark Ones and on the brink of the Apocalypse. It's a complete rpg, full of storytelling elements and powered by an easy ruleset that encourages players to identify themselves with their characters describing epic scenes! Enjoy a memorable playing experience thanks to the Musha Shugyo ruleset, designed to create spectacular and cinematic duels.

Can't wait to see the real thing? Download a FREE rpg demo here!

Acchiappasogni is happy to provide a special Print on Demand offer for our backers. After the campaign ends, you will receive a free coupon that will allow you to buy a copy paying the lowest possible printing and shipping costs.

 

We aim to create the first book of our graphic novel, plain and simple. The more funds we will receive, the bigger the book will get, the more features it will have and the more convenient each backer's pledge will become. Help us reach the highest peaks!
 

 

1200 $ – More pages in the comic book (16 pages)

1800 $ – 16 pages comic FULL COLORED.

3000 $ – More pages in the comic (20 pages) AND a BONUS COVER created by Cosimo Ferri.

4250 $ – More pages in the comic (24 pages) AND you unlock the exclusive "Sancta Sanctorum Experience" with TouPlay. If the Stretch Goal is reached, the 20 most generous backers will win an invitation to attend the Sancta Sanctorum Live event in Apulia. Get ready to dive into Sancta Sanctorum universe!

5500 $ – Your exclusive copy will include a piece of wonderful artwork made by Antonio Sarchione.

6750 $ – Your exclusive copy will include  a piece of awesome artwork made by Leonardo Colapietro.

8000 $ – Your exclusive copy will include a piece of wonderful artwork made by Maurizio Rosenzweig.

9250 $ – Your exclusive copy will include a piece of awesome artwork made by Alberto Ponticelli.

10.500 $ – Your exclusive copy will include a  piece of wonderful artwork made by Dany Orizio.

12.000 $ - Your exclusive copy will include a BONUS COVER made by Alessio Fortunato.

 

To keep backers’ costs as low as possible and to be sure we can deliver everything on time, MOST of the rewards provided in a DIGITAL (HI-RES PDF) format. This means that the additional comics (Xaulos, the Game Rules and Ash Airways), the diplomas, the certificates, the indulgences and the concept book will be delivered to you via e-mail in pdf format after the campaign ends.

On the other hand, on-demand commissions and original, signed pages will be PHYSICAL rewards, shipped internationally and free of charge for backers.

 

Important Print-on-Demand and shipping info

Ok, your pledge granted you a digital (PDF) copy. What if you wanted a printed version too?

Look for this symbol:

 

If the reward you selected with your pledge has the above symbol, it will be later available for a Print-on-Demand option via DriveThruComics. When our books are proofed and ready, we will send you (and to every other single backer) a special discount that allows you to purchase the print format of our titles at the mere cost of printing and shipping (ONLY IF you actually want a printed copy, of course!). This way, our supporters will benefit of two important advantages:

1. Our backers will pay the absolute base print cost plus DriveThru shipping charges (which are actual charges, not inflated in any way). This means that backers SAVE MONEY this way instead of paying additional fees due to the crowdfunding campaign.

2. You can this way buy as many printed copies as you want, deciding the exact amount on the actual purchase day, and not beforehand.

Physical copies of the Rebel Saints comic book, the Sketchbook and the Artbook will be available for the PoD option this way.

This way we allow you to pay the less possible amount for printing and shipping costs, which would inevitably increase if we had to include them beforehand in our campaign. Thank you for your understanding, we are sure you'll appreciate this "discount" on your exclusive books's printing and shipping fares.

We will NOT offer print-on-demand Diplomas, Holy Certificates or Indulgences. They are "one-of-a-kind" pieces and we’re sure you’ll find a lot of less expensive ways to print those for yourselves from the HI-RES pdf we’ll send you and hang them on the wall in a nice frame if you wish!

Of course, if your pledge involves more than one printed item, you will pay shipping costs only once. For further info and details,  please check these links:

official DriveThruComics page on printing costs

official DriveThruComics page on shipping costs.

For an accurate price quotation note that the comic book is a "Softbound book" up to 64 pages while the artbook and the sketchbook are "hardbound books" up to 64 pages.

For your convenience, we already provided you an approximate printing cost for every single reward available on PoD. We recommend to follow the aforementioned links for a more accurate price quotation.

 

GILBERT GALLO - Writer

Like all superheroes, during the day Gilbert is the proud hard-working proud father of two children, while at night he writes novels about the Sancta Sanctorum universe. Always chasing his dreams, Gilbert likes to tell stories any way he can. He writes novels, short stories, tabletop rpgs, comics, and videogames. His works are published in English, Italian and Polish language. Among his wide array of published tabletop rpgs there’s the Italian edition of Cyberpunk V3, Mythos - the Greek Mythological setting and Darkmoor, the self-deprecating rpg setting successfully funded on Kickstarter.

Click on the name to know more about Gilbert.

 

 

MICHELE d'ALOISIO - Artist

 

Michele D’Aloisio is a painter, engraver and illustrator. He met every single saint in pictures, statues and engravings while attending the Academy of Fine Arts in Rome, where he explored the infinite world of traditional painting techniques. After his graduation, he founded his own school, where he teaches his students the new possibilities of crossbreeding traditional and digital techniques. He’s now experimenting this new style and wave in the field of illustration and comics. He was impatient to start working on the Sancta Sanctorum graphic novel. Don’t make him wait!

This is an excerpt of his ever-increasing list of artworks and exhibitions.

In 2013 he started working together with screenwriter and writer Federico Mazzei on many projects, comics, art courses and online comics (for example Ash Airways, currently online).

In 2008 he started co-working with screenwriter Ivan Veronica for the creation of sci-fi graphic novels and other stories.

In 2007 he started working on comic books, cooperating with the writer Marcello D'Angelo (co-worker of Andrea Pazienza) for the creation of graphic novels for "Night" art magazine.

He takes part in many exhibitions. In 2005/2006 he was selected as a representative of the Academy of Fine Arts in Rome in the Graphic Arts category for the "National Art Award".

His works gained the podium during the "Fourth Edition of the Biennial Engravers Award" held in Monsummano Terme. In 2006, he participated in the "Primaverile Romana" organized by A.R.G.A.M.

Click on the name to know more about Michele.

 

DANIELE SOLFRINI - Scriptwriter

Born on February 26th, 1987 in Brescia (BS) Daniele Solfrini is an author of many facets. Art director, illustrator, writer, editor, advertising, graphics and more. Graduated from the school of comics in Milan, Daniele has worked for years in the boardgames industry, without forgetting his old love for graphic novels that drove him to embrace the Sancta Sanctorum project.

Click on the name to know more about Daniele.

 

Our HOLY HELPERS

Thanks to these companies' support we can provide you so many rewards! Together we will face the Armageddon! (click on the names to know more)

 

ACCHIAPPASOGNI

ACHERON BOOKS

 

GRAFITE comic school

 

GRAmel

 

TOU.PLAY

 

 

Risks & Challenges

We planned carefully every single step to be sure to have the highest chances of fullfilling the project in time.
Every single member of the team has already successfully completed different crowdfunding projects, so we know what we're doing. :D
Every single member of the team has worked for many years in his own field of expertise. We're sure each one of us will do his work in time as usual. This is our "first time together" and we're sure we'll do even better than before.
We opted for a print-on-demand solution with a very reliable partner to minimize risks and to lower backers' costs. We're confident that they will deliver every single PoD item on time.
The companies that support us are run by very skilled people we personally know, so we're sure they will deliver their content without problems and on time.
The only thing we need to be successful is you to believe in us and support the project with a pledge.
Thank you for believing in us the same way we believe in you!

 

Other Ways You Can Help (without possibly spending money)

You can help us a lot by spreading the news about this project in every possible way becoming either a Relic Hunter (see perks) or a Social Sinner (see below).

Social Sinners are supporters that using social medias spread the word about this campaign around the globe. The more you share our project, the more rewards you get! Make a post where you share a DIRECT LINK to our IndieGoGo campaign on a social platform you like (facebook, twitter, google+ etc.) For every 20 "shares" or 50 "likes" you get on your post, you get a FREE Partial Indulgence of your choice! Send a screen capture to info@sanctasanctorumofficial.com before the campaign ends. If everything's right, you will get your indulgence(s) when the campaign ends! This way, non-financial backers can still have a reward for their help while backers can increase their rewards!

Remember: you can be a backer AND a Social Sinner at the same time! The more you spread the word, the more rewards you get!

In addition to that, follow our acounts and keep spreading the word. You will gain our eternal gratitude (and perhaps a place in Heavens too).

 

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/SSanctorvm/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/SSanctorvm
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCLiePHGs9AgeELhF7fvp3hA

Website: http://www.sanctasanctorumofficial.com/
story_txt:
ITALIANI cliccate qui per la pagina in ITALIANO
 

Sancta Sanctorum is a new urban fantasy comic set in an alternate/dystopic present Earth where the Saints themselves (the "original" Saint Nicholas, Saint Augustine himself etc.) awoke from the Holy Relics to fight against the swarming Demons from hell.
Inspired by “The Preacher”, “American Gods”, “Hellblazer”, the "Da Vinci Code", the “Dogma” movie and the "Saint Seiya" manga, this graphic novel faces strong themes like faith, religion and gives a new, modern, fast and furious view of some of the most important heroes in human history: the Saints.

Peter II Roman, Patriarch of the new church
 
Our main characters are not "perfect" Saints, but "imperfect" human sinners instead, who can wield the miracles hidden in the Holy Relics. They are called the Martyrs. The Saints of the new Church persecute the Martyrs as dangerous heretics and claim one of them is the Antichrist in disguise. The Martyrs on the other hand wish to stop the Patriarch from erasing all human sinners from the Earth along with Demons. Who's right? Who's wrong? Follow us and discover the truth behind many of Christianity myth mysteries...
The setting is inspired by a novel written by Gilbert Gallo (that would be me, guys!), artwork is provided by Michele d’Aloisio and script by Daniele Solfrini. If this all sounds like your cup of tea, read on and support our crusade!
 


The Dark Ones swarming on Earth
A few years ago on Earth suddenly appeared the Dark Ones: demonic creatures who craved human souls and flesh. In no time, they decimated the world’s population but, when all seemed lost, a young boy acquired directly from Heaven incredible powers. He appointed himself the Patriarch of the one faith, thus founding the New Church “Dei Invicti Operae”.
Guided by the word of God, the Patriarch awakened the spirits of the Saints from their Relics. The Holy Father guided his legions of Saints against the Dark Ones and, after years of relentless war, the forces of the Lord eventually triumphed. Today, life goes on under the guidance and control of the New Church, who wishes to exterminate all Demons and establish the "Kingdom of God" on Earth.

St. Augustine - Scourge of Heretics and slayer of Dark Ones
 
Alas, internal strife, heretical divisions and rebellion against the strict divine laws are on the agenda. To make matters worse, the Dark Ones, even if defeated, are still a concrete threat that the New Church wishes to eradicate once and for all. The Patriarch instituted an authoritarian theocracy where the Saints, supported by flocks of winged Chrismatics, maintain order and protect people from all enemies, whether external or internal to the Pontificate. The vast majority of the population is happy to live as the “Lord’s flock” and sees in the New Church the only hope against the Dark Ones.
There is also a different type of divine beings: the Martyrs. These powerful hybrids between a man and a Saint are human sinners (with all kind of human vices and flaws) who can wield the incredible powers of the Holy Relics.

Egil - keeper of St. George's relic
 
Forced to live as fugitives, they are hunted by the most branched and organized New Church  who has branded them as heretics.
 

Arian - keeper of St. Lucy's relic.
 
The Martyrs are the main characters of Sancta Sanctorum graphic novel. In this #1 issue called "The Rebel Saints", the story follows the young Taro, a reckless, naive but good-hearted boy, who unintentionally becomes a victim of the power games and the struggles between the New Church and the secret society called the “God’s Hand” who employs Martyrs to accomplish its own goals.

Taro - keeper of the Holy Shroud
 
Taro’s uncle, the bishop of Turin, who is a powerful member of the God’s Hand, replaces the Holy Shroud with a fake, wishing to hinder the Patriarch’s secret plan of destroying the human race and building a sinless world inhabited only by Saints. Alas, the patron saint of the city, St. John the Baptist, discovers the theft and sentences the bishop and his nephew Taro to be burned at the stakes. The Martyrs arrive just in time to save the day and witness the incredible miracle of Taro merging with the Holy Shroud, acquiring its great powers. This way, Taro will become a Martyr too, and his life will be forever changed.
 

Leo - keeper of St. Francis's relic.
 
In this troubled scenario will take place the epic deeds of the Martyrs: too divine to be mere humans, but too imperfect to be Saints. Persecuted by the New Church and tempted by the Dark Ones, Taro and his incredible friends will face difficult choices on the narrow line between good and evil, constantly testing their faith. Who among them is the Antichrist? Which side will they join? They have to decide quickly, the Armageddon is coming ...

CLICK HERE for more info on the Setting 

 

 
  Enjoy a sneak peek of the comic's pages!
 

Young Taro is saved from the burning stakes by Leo, one of the Martyrs.
 

Using his metamorphosis powers, Leo fights against the Chrismatics.
 

Arian shoots alchemical bullets against the winged Chrismatic soldiers.
 

Suddenly, an uninvited Dark One appears and wreaks havoc on the square
 

We aim to create the first book of our graphic novel series. The more funds we will receive, the bigger the book will get and the more features it will have. Now, let's see in detail how many wonderful things you can get for your invaluable help:
 
THE EXCLUSIVE, BACKERS-ONLY COMIC BOOK

Sancta Sanctorum #1 - The Rebel Saints. Exclusive, backers-only cover. Artwork @Michele D'Aloisio

Get our awesome issue #1 comic book in an exclusive, backers-only digital version. This issue will include all stretch goals and will be available to BACKERS ONLY! Yes, 100% exclusive! There will be no way to get it after the campaign ends. Future customers will buy a comic with a different cover and without stretch goals in it.
The “base” form of this exclusive issue will contain 12 pages B&W. The more stretch goals we hit, the more pages (and goodies) it will feature and it will switcth from B&W to fully colored! Keep spreading the word and help us make this exclusive issue the biggest and most beautiful ever! The comic will be available either in English or Italian. Choose your preferred language and enjoy!
(Note: After the project is successfully funded, this reward will be available exclusively with a print-on-demand option. Estimated printing costs: 5.5 Euros / 6.2 US$. For more info see the “Important Print-on-Demand and Shipping Info” section below.)
 
Diplomas of ORDINATION

Congratulations! You are now a part of Sancta Sanctorum universe!
Our digital diplomas testify to the world your incredible efforts in supporting our campaign. Each diploma changes according to your donation (the more generous, the more important the diploma is). Show it to your friends or print it and hang it on a wall! The different “titles” you can achieve on a diploma are as follows:
- Blessed Citizen,
- Chrismatic
- Elite Chrismatic
- Blessed Gamer
Diplomas will be available in pdf format either in English or Italian. Choose your preferred language and we’ll deliver it to you digitally!
 
Thanks on TWITTER!

Hear the Angels singing your name from our Twitter account!
Hear the angels sing your name in the heavens! We will shout out to the winds our sincerest gratitude via our official Twitter account! Another cool way to show you our appreciation! Our thanks can be written either in English or Italian. Choose your preferred language and we’ll announce it for you!
 
More Comics!
Enjoy more comics from the creators of Sancta Sanctorum! Click on the names for more info.
The Game Rules & Xaulos: the Beginning
6 issues of Ash Airways
Note: These comics will be available in digital (PDF) format only.
 
INDULGENCES 

Partial Indulgence - Gluttony
Everyone of us is a sinner… But if you support our project with great generosity, then His Supreme Holiness, the Patriarch, of the Dei Invicti Operae Church will be moved to bestow you a partial or a complete deliverance from all your sins, even the mortal ones. All you have to do is sincerely repent, by donating money to this project with all your heart and to ask for divine forgiveness. Depending on your generosity, you can get one or both of the following rewards:
- Partial Indulgence: Choose one Deadly Sin (pride, greed, lust, maliciousness, envy, gluttony, wrathfulness or slothfulness) and give us your full name. The Patriarch will issue you a partial indulgence that delivers you from all deadly sins of that kind committed so far.
- Complete (Plenary) Indulgence: The most generous ones will be awarded with a complete indulgence that cancels ALL sins committed so far.
Indulgences can be granted to you or to whomever you wish, making them a great present idea! Just provide us with the sinner’s name and the Patriarch will issue the Indulgence for her/him. Indulgences are issued in digital (pdf) format only, in English or Italian. Choose the language and we’ll deliver it to you digitally!
 
SKETCHBOOK of Sancta Sanctorum

An exclusive, backers-only sketchbook of the Sancta Sanctorum world.

 
Talking about secrets… Discover all “behind the scenes” of our wonderful comic. Sketches, inkings and much more await you in this book that gathers all the preparatory work to create this awesome project! Don’t miss ANYTHING about Sancta Sanctorum’s birth and development. This reward will be available to BACKERS ONLY! There is no way to way to get it after the campaign ends.
(Note: After the project is successfully funded, this reward will be available exclusively for backers for a print-on-demand option. Estimated printing costs: 13 Euros / 14.6 US$. For more info see the “Important Print-on-Demand and Shipping Info.” section below.)
 
HOLY CERTIFICATES 

Get an exclusive description of your holy powers
To testify your great importance in the world of Sancta Sanctorum, His Supreme Holiness, the Patriarch, will personally issue a custom, specific certificate that describes your unique powers as a Saint, as a Martyr, as a member of the Hand of God, as the Patriarch himself or as the dreaded Antichrist!!! Send us a picture of your choice, choose your holy powers and we will do the rest, adding some Sancta Sanctorum flavor to the certificate to make it an incredible memento of your generosity and kindness and a shining example of virtue for all people. This is a unique and especially made piece, so be proud of it! There will be no other Holy Certificate like yours! Depending on your generosity, there are different ranks available:
- Saint 
- Martyr 
- Member of the Hand of God (limited to #5 backers only)
- Patriarch (limited to ONLY ONE backer).
- Antichrist (limited to ONLY ONE backer).
Holy certificates are issued in digital (pdf) format in English or Italian. Choose the language and we’ll deliver it to you digitally!
 
ARTBOOK of Sancta Sanctorum

An exclusive, backers-only artbook about the world of Sancta Sanctorum and beyond.

 
Enjoying Michele’s art is easy.Falling in love with it is unavoidable. In this precious art book Michele will share many of his most important drawings, which will captivate your eyes and dive deep into your emotions. Definitely a great piece of art. This reward will be available to BACKERS ONLY! No way to get it after the campaign ends.
(Note: After the project is successfully funded, this reward will be available exclusively for backers for a print-on-demand option. Estimated printing costs: 13 Euros / 14.6 US$. For more info see the “Important Print-on-Demand and Shipping Info.” section below.)
 
CONCEPT BOOK of Sancta Sanctorum

Many different points of view on the Sancta Sanctorum universe.
The world of Sancta Sanctorum inspired many talented artists all over the world. This book contains the best art pieces selected during the “Saint Contest”. It features many different point of views on the main characters, the Saints and on the project itself. Be ready to open your mind as well as your eyes to fully enjoy these masterpieces! Note: the concept book will be delivered in digital (PDF) format only.
 
Your HOLY CERTIFICATE on URBAN DICTIONARY

Urban Dictionary entry - Example
To reward your incredible generosity, we will create a page on Urban Dictionary where we will describe your awesome holy powers and miracles as a Saint/Martyr/Hand of God member or Patriarch. Everyone must know about your awesome powers and miracles! Be ready to be worshipped! This service is available in English and Italian. Choose your language and wait for notoriety! (Note: actual publication on the UD website depends on UD webmaster's final decisions, which we cannot influence).
 
FEATURED CHARACTER – Background

Featured Character  - Background example
Your dream of appearing in a comic finally becomes true! Your appearance will be discussed with the artist and we’ll do our best to meet your desires and expectations. Your character will appear in the back row (like the winged Chrismatics of this scene) and he’ll look good!
 
FEATURED CHARACTER – FRONT and CENTER

Featured Character  - Front and Center example
Your dream of becoming famous becomes true. You will be portrayed in the foreground of one of the comic’s scenes. Your appearance will be discussed with the artist and we’ll do our best to meet your desires and expectations. Your character will appear in the front (like one of these two characters). You’ll make a hell of an impression!
 
ORIGINAL, SIGNED PAGE

Original Page - Example
For all you comic collectors out there, this is your chance to own one of the original A3 pages of Sancta Sanctorum inked and signed by Michele d’Aloisio himself! First come, first serve, so don’t wait, else your favorite page could be already spoken for! If you cannot go and pick it up directly from Michele’s house don't’ worry,  we will ship worldwide and free of charge!
 
ORIGINAL, ON-DEMAND drawing by Michele d’Aloisio

One of Michele D'Aloisio commissioned masterpieces
To thank your incredibly generous donation, Michele will be available just for you to draw whatever you like (people, animals, saints, martyrs, landscapes etc.) in full color on A3 paper. If you cannot go and pick up the masterpiece directly from Michele’s house don't’ worry, we will ship worldwide and free of charge!
 
DEDICATION This is a very special reward, available to Antichrist-level pledges only. We will dedicate the exclusive backers only. Issue  to you or to one person of your choice. Just tell us the name and we'll do our best to make a wonderful dedication. Choose wisely, this is the ultimate present for a person you care for.

The EXCLUSIVE TRIPTYCH


The stunning Triptych drawn by Michele d'Aloisio
This is the ultimate exclusive reward, available to Antichrist-level pledges only. You will receive the original triptych representing Dark Ones, Martyrs and Saints, signed by Michele D'Aloisio. Just add a nice frame and you will have a true masterpiece to hang on your favorite wall. No matter where you live, we will deliver it to you, free of charge.
 
HOLY NOVELS 
Thanks to Acheron Book's support, we are proud to offer you a great selection of their best books of speculative fiction. All titles will be available in digital format only either in English or in Italian. Click on the names to learn more.
Eternal War - Armies of Saints
Demon Hunter Severian - Lady of the Night Gates
Poison Fairies - The Landfill War
 
Tabletop RPG Settings
Would you like to fight in first person against the Dark Ones? Or would you rather fight against the New Church? Try our tabletop Role-Playing settins inspired by the graphic novel! You and your friends will become the new Rebel Saints! Some are exclusive, backers-only rewards, so don't miss this chance to get them!  Click on the names to know more.
Both RPG settings will be availablein specific pledges and/or as ADD-ONs. Getting them as an add-on is easy:
Step 1: Choose a Perk and pay for it 
Step 2: Go back to the homepage and select "Back it" from the main menu
Step 3: Enter the desired amount (15$, 1$ or 16$ for both rpgs)
Step 4: send an email to info@sanctasanctorumofficial where you explain which add-ons you want. 
Just add the following amounts to whatever pledge you like to get one (or BOTH!) of them:
- Adventurers! the Rebel Saints (PDF): add +1$ to any Pledge you like.
- Sancta Sanctorum RPG powered by Musha Shugyo (PDF) : add +15$ to any pledge you like.

An exclusive, backers-only setting for Adventurers! - Revised Edition 
Live the thrilling tales of the Sancta Sanctorum setting in this 2 pages, fast and furious setting for "Adventurers! - Revised edition" ruleset. The perfect solution for gamers who want to immediately dive into the setting and explore the many mysteries of the New Church! (IMPORTANT NOTE: Adventurers! is a property of GRAmel. You need the Adventurers! - Revised Edition core book to play this setting).
 
 

Sancta Sanctorum RPG teaser - powered by Musha Shugyo 

Our partner Acchiappasogni is proud to offer you a copy of Sancta Sanctorum rpg - Powered by Musha Shugyo. This rpg will allow you to become one of the Martyrs or one of the Saints (!) in a dystopian world plagued by the Dark Ones and on the brink of the Apocalypse. It's a complete rpg, full of storytelling elements and powered by an easy ruleset that encourages players to identify themselves with their characters describing epic scenes! Enjoy a memorable playing experience thanks to the Musha Shugyo ruleset, designed to create spectacular and cinematic duels.
Can't wait to see the real thing? Download a FREE rpg demo here!
Acchiappasogni is happy to provide a special Print on Demand offer for our backers. After the campaign ends, you will receive a free coupon that will allow you to buy a copy paying the lowest possible printing and shipping costs.
 

We aim to create the first book of our graphic novel, plain and simple. The more funds we will receive, the bigger the book will get, the more features it will have and the more convenient each backer's pledge will become. Help us reach the highest peaks! 

 
1200 $ – More pages in the comic book (16 pages)
1800 $ – 16 pages comic FULL COLORED.
3000 $ – More pages in the comic (20 pages) AND a BONUS COVER created by Cosimo Ferri.
4250 $ – More pages in the comic (24 pages) AND you unlock the exclusive "Sancta Sanctorum Experience" with TouPlay. If the Stretch Goal is reached, the 20 most generous backers will win an invitation to attend the Sancta Sanctorum Live event in Apulia. Get ready to dive into Sancta Sanctorum universe!
5500 $ – Your exclusive copy will include a piece of wonderful artwork made by Antonio Sarchione.
6750 $ – Your exclusive copy will include  a piece of awesome artwork made by Leonardo Colapietro.
8000 $ – Your exclusive copy will include a piece of wonderful artwork made by Maurizio Rosenzweig.
9250 $ – Your exclusive copy will include a piece of awesome artwork made by Alberto Ponticelli.
10.500 $ – Your exclusive copy will include a  piece of wonderful artwork made by Dany Orizio.
12.000 $ - Your exclusive copy will include a BONUS COVER made by Alessio Fortunato.
 

To keep backers’ costs as low as possible and to be sure we can deliver everything on time, MOST of the rewards provided in a DIGITAL (HI-RES PDF) format. This means that the additional comics (Xaulos, the Game Rules and Ash Airways), the diplomas, the certificates, the indulgences and the concept book will be delivered to you via e-mail in pdf format after the campaign ends.
On the other hand, on-demand commissions and original, signed pages will be PHYSICAL rewards, shipped internationally and free of charge for backers.
 
Important Print-on-Demand and shipping info
Ok, your pledge granted you a digital (PDF) copy. What if you wanted a printed version too?
Look for this symbol:

 
If the reward you selected with your pledge has the above symbol, it will be later available for a Print-on-Demand option via DriveThruComics. When our books are proofed and ready, we will send you (and to every other single backer) a special discount that allows you to purchase the print format of our titles at the mere cost of printing and shipping (ONLY IF you actually want a printed copy, of course!). This way, our supporters will benefit of two important advantages:
1. Our backers will pay the absolute base print cost plus DriveThru shipping charges (which are actual charges, not inflated in any way). This means that backers SAVE MONEY this way instead of paying additional fees due to the crowdfunding campaign.
2. You can this way buy as many printed copies as you want, deciding the exact amount on the actual purchase day, and not beforehand.
Physical copies of the Rebel Saints comic book, the Sketchbook and the Artbook will be available for the PoD option this way.
This way we allow you to pay the less possible amount for printing and shipping costs, which would inevitably increase if we had to include them beforehand in our campaign. Thank you for your understanding, we are sure you'll appreciate this "discount" on your exclusive books's printing and shipping fares.
We will NOT offer print-on-demand Diplomas, Holy Certificates or Indulgences. They are "one-of-a-kind" pieces and we’re sure you’ll find a lot of less expensive ways to print those for yourselves from the HI-RES pdf we’ll send you and hang them on the wall in a nice frame if you wish!
Of course, if your pledge involves more than one printed item, you will pay shipping costs only once. For further info and details,  please check these links:
official DriveThruComics page on printing costs
official DriveThruComics page on shipping costs.
For an accurate price quotation note that the comic book is a "Softbound book" up to 64 pages while the artbook and the sketchbook are "hardbound books" up to 64 pages.
For your convenience, we already provided you an approximate printing cost for every single reward available on PoD. We recommend to follow the aforementioned links for a more accurate price quotation.
 


GILBERT GALLO - Writer
Like all superheroes, during the day Gilbert is the proud hard-working proud father of two children, while at night he writes novels about the Sancta Sanctorum universe. Always chasing his dreams, Gilbert likes to tell stories any way he can. He writes novels, short stories, tabletop rpgs, comics, and videogames. His works are published in English, Italian and Polish language. Among his wide array of published tabletop rpgs there’s the Italian edition of Cyberpunk V3, Mythos - the Greek Mythological setting and Darkmoor, the self-deprecating rpg setting successfully funded on Kickstarter.
Click on the name to know more about Gilbert.
 
 

MICHELE d'ALOISIO - Artist
 
Michele D’Aloisio is a painter, engraver and illustrator. He met every single saint in pictures, statues and engravings while attending the Academy of Fine Arts in Rome, where he explored the infinite world of traditional painting techniques. After his graduation, he founded his own school, where he teaches his students the new possibilities of crossbreeding traditional and digital techniques. He’s now experimenting this new style and wave in the field of illustration and comics. He was impatient to start working on the Sancta Sanctorum graphic novel. Don’t make him wait!
This is an excerpt of his ever-increasing list of artworks and exhibitions.

He takes part in many exhibitions. In 2005/2006 he was selected as a representative of the Academy of Fine Arts in Rome in the Graphic Arts category for the "National Art Award".
His works gained the podium during the "Fourth Edition of the Biennial Engravers Award" held in Monsummano Terme. In 2006, he participated in the "Primaverile Romana" organized by A.R.G.A.M.

Born on February 26th, 1987 in Brescia (BS) Daniele Solfrini is an author of many facets. Art director, illustrator, writer, editor, advertising, graphics and more. Graduated from the school of comics in Milan, Daniele has worked for years in the boardgames industry, without forgetting his old love for graphic novels that drove him to embrace the Sancta Sanctorum project.

story:
SIRENA

Graphic Novel - First Edition (available in English and Italian)

"Un giovane tormentato s’innamora perdutamente di una misteriosa fanciulla che viene dal mare e che cambierà per sempre la sua vita". 

***

SIRENA è un progetto ideato da Giorgio B. Borgazzi in collaborazione con Simona Fiori.

Claudio Sciarrone ne cura i disegni e l' adattamento, illustrando la graphic novel che prenderà le forme di una fiaba dark.

La nostra idea nasce dall’esigenza di sperimentare nuovi universi narrativi e per questo abbiamo deciso di creare una storia che possa diventare la genesi di un progetto transmediale indipendente: da un comicbook a un film.

SIRENA sarà, infatti, il prequel, sottoforma di Graphic Novel, di un lungometraggio caratterizzato da una commistione di forme d’arte.

Il nostro fine ultimo è quello di dare valore all’indipendenza artistica, nella quale crediamo moltissimo, creando una storia che abbia la capacità di appassionarvi e coinvolgervi al punto di non riuscire ad aspettare l'uscita del film!

Abbiamo deciso di dare vita a questo progetto attraverso una campagna di crowdfunding perché siamo fermamente convinti che l’unico modo per dare il giusto rilievo alla Graphic Novel sia attraverso il supporto dei suoi veri sostenitori, voi lettori!

Qualunque sarà il vostro contributo diventerete parte integrante ed essenziale del nostro piccolo grande sogno!

 

"Tormented by his peers, an adolescent falls madly in love with a mysterious girl who comes from the sea and who will change his life forever".

SIRENA is a dark fairytale conceived by the film writer/director Giorgio B. Borgazzi in collaboration with Simona Fiori and will be illustrated by the well-known comic artist Claudio Sciarrone.

Our idea arises from the need to experiment with new narrative universes and for this reason we decided to create a story capable of becoming the genesis of an independent transmedia project: from a graphic novel to a movie.

SIRENA will be the prequel, in the form of Graphic Novel, to a feature film characterized by a mixture of art forms. 

Our main purpose is to promote the independent art, to which we are totally committed, by creating a story so engaging and exciting that you can’t wait to see the movie!

We decided to use a crowdfunding campaign to bring this project to life because we are firmly convinced that the only way to ensure SIRENA receives the attention it deserves, is through the help of its true supporters - the readers!

Whatever your contribution, you will become an essential part of our little big dream!

 

LA STORIA

C’è un vecchio ponte malfermo nel bosco sopra la scogliera. Quel ponte sul mare è il luogo preferito di Paul, solitario e introverso adolescente, con un talento che lo eleva ma che lo rende solo, il disegno.

In quel luogo sospeso, Paul fa un incontro che cambierà per sempre la sua vita. Proprio dal mare emerge una creatura bella e inquietante, dal corpo fragile e longilineo con un diastema tra le labbra rosse. La ragazza compare senza preavviso, senza abiti e senza voce. Paul la crede muta ma la notte gli parla in sogno. 

Va e viene attraverso l’acqua e i sogni, consolidando ogni volta un sentimento speciale nel cuore del giovane. Lei sola capisce le sue tristezze, lei sola apprezza il suo animo creativo, lei sola sa chi è davvero Paul. 

Ben presto, i compagni di classe che lo deridono, i genitori che osteggiano la sua passione, non sono più un problema. Nella mente del ragazzo c’è solo lei, l’amore che viene dal mare, che gli dona la forza per ribellarsi agli altri, per contrastare un mondo ostile. Anche per lei sembra esistere solo Paul.

Ma questo legame speciale ha le sue ombre, i suoi riti: il sangue che lei pretende, le lacrime silenziose che senza un motivo apparente le solcano il viso, le squame sottili che si staccano dalla pelle diafana ogni volta che fanno l’amore e il latte dolcissimo che lei gli dona.

Forse quella fanciulla così effimera e bella, appartiene a un altro mondo. Forse, come le sirene che si allontanano troppo dall’acqua, soffre ad ogni passo come se una spada affilata le trapassasse quelle bizzarre estremità che noi umani chiamiamo gambe.

 

THE STORY

There's an old bridge in the woods above the cliff. It's the favorite place of Paul, a solitary, introverted teenager with a talent that both isolates him and gives him immense pleasure: drawing.

On that bridge, Paul has an encounter which will change his life forever. From the sea emerges a beautiful and disturbing creature with a delicate long-limbed body and a gap between the two front teeth which are visible between her red lips. Naked and silent, the girl appears without warning. Paul thinks she must be mute, but during the night she speaks to him in a dream.

She comes and goes, through water and through dreams, consolidating each time a powerful feeling in the heart of the young man. She alone understands his sadness, she alone appreciates his creative soul, she alone knows who Paul really is.

Before long, the classmates who bully him and the parents who oppose his passion stop being a problem: in the boy's mind there is only her, the lover who comes from the sea, who gives him the strength to rebel and to fight back against a hostile world. And for her too, only Paul seems to exist.

But this special bond has its shadows, its rituals: the blood that she demands, the silent tears that for no apparent reason streak down her face, the thin scales which her diaphanous skin sheds each time they make love and the sweet milk that she feeds him. Perhaps that girl, so ephemeral and beautiful, belongs to another world. Perhaps, like the sirens that stray too far from the water, she suffers with each step as though a sword were piercing those bizarre extremities that we humans call legs.

 

PREVIEW

Here's a preview of what Sirena will be:

 

TEAM

CLAUDIO SCIARRONE: Disegnatore di fumetti con più di 20 anni di esperienza nell'industria dello spettacolo. Ha lavorato come character designer e concept artist per grandi marchi come: Walt Disney, Nickelodeon, Nintendo. Co-creatore di PK/Duck Avenger, una saga acclamata internazionalmente. Ha illustrato graphic novels, pubblicate in tutto il mondo, come Monsters Inc., Finding Nemo, Wall-E, e tanti altri prequel di Treasure Planet, Tron Legacy e Big Hero 6.

CLAUDIO SCIARRONE: Comic books artist with more than 20 years experience in the entertainment industry. He worked as a character designer and concept artist for big brands like: Walt Disney, Nickelodeon, Nintendo. Co-creator of PK / Duck Avenger, an internationally acclaimed saga. He has illustrated graphic novels, published all over the world, such as Monsters Inc., Finding Nemo, Wall-E, and many other prequels from Treasure Planet, Tron Legacy and Big Hero 6.

GIORGIO B. BORGAZZI - sceneggiatore: Nell'arco di una ventina d'anni realizza e produce cortometraggi, pubblicità, documentari e film aziendali. I suoi corti ottengono numerosi riconoscimenti in festival nazionali e internazionali, dal Torino al Sundance Film Festival. I suoi ultimi lavori vincono anche “Le prix des Femmes” al Festival Le Temps Press di Parigi e “II cavallo di Leonardo” al MIFF a Milano.

GIORGIO B. BORGAZZI - screenwriter: In the space of twenty years he achieves and produces short films, commercials, documentaries and corporate films. His shorts have won numerous awards at national and international festivals, from Turin to the Sundance Film Festival. His latest works also won "Le prix des Femmes" at the Le Temps Press Festival in Paris and "Leonardo's Horse" at the MIFF in Milan.

SIMONA FIORI - sceneggiatrice: Scrittrice del libro “Paciv Tuke, sporchi cannibali e ladri di bambini”. Si distingue come sceneggiatrice e regista di cortometraggi, partecipando negli anni in vari ruoli nelle diverse fasi produttive di numerosi progetti. 

SIMONA FIORI - screenwriter: writer of the book "Paciv Tuke, dirty cannibals and thieves of children". She distinguished herself as a screenwriter and director of short films, participating over the years in various roles in the various production phases of numerous projects.

COME CONTRIBUIRE

È molto semplice: se il nostro ambizioso progetto ti ha appassionato e ti piace l’idea di collaborare in prima persona, segui questi semplici step e diventa un sostenitore!

  1. Scopri la lista di "premi" o "perks" che possiamo offrirti
  2. Scegli quello che più ti rappresenta
  3. Procedi all'acquisto online con carta di credito

 

HOW TO CONTRIBUTE

It's very simple: if you're excited by the idea of our ambitious project and you like the idea of participating, follow these simple steps and become a supporter!

  1. Check out the list of "perks" we can offer you

  2. Choose the one that best represents you

  3. Proceed to purchase online with a credit card

PASSAPAROLA 

Se non puoi contribuire con una quota in denaro non significa che non puoi aiutarci. Per raggiungere il nostro obiettivo è importantissimo che più persone possibili vengano a conoscenza del nostro progetto! Aiutaci condividendo questa pagina sui social, su whatsapp o semplicemente via email, il tuo aiuto sarà fondamentale!

Utilizza l'hashtag ufficiale: #SirenaCrowdfunding

 

WORD OF MOUTH  

If you can’t contribute with a cash donation, that doesn’t mean you can’t help us. To reach our goal, it’s crucial that as many people as possible become aware of our project! Help us by sharing this page on social media, on whatsapp or simply by email, your help will be essential!

Use the official hashtag: #SirenaCrowdfunding

 

PREMI 

Da 5 € a 1.000 € scegli la donazione e il premio che fa per te!

5 € THANKS: un grande grazie e il poster in versione digitale di SIRENA
A big 'thank you' and the digital version of the poster for SIRENA

20 € BASIC: una copia stampata della graphic novel SIRENA
A printed copy of the graphic novel SIRENA

30 € SPECIAL: una copia stampata e autografata dagli autori di SIRENA + poster di SIRENA 50X70.
A printed copy of SIRENA autographed by the authors + the poster of SIRENA 50X70

40 € SKETCH AUTOGRAPH: una copia stampata della graphic novel SIRENA + uno sketch autografato da Claudio Sciarrone.
A printed copy of the SIRENA graphic novel + a sketch autographed by Claudio Sciarrone

50 € PHOTOSHOP EDITION: una copia stampata della graphic novel SIRENA + una copia digitale di SIRENA in Photoshop (.PSD) con livelli aperti.
A printed copy of the SIRENA graphic novel + a digital copy of SIRENA in Photoshop (.PSD) with open layers

70 € MAIN CONTRIBUTOR: una copia stampata e autografata dagli autori di SIRENA + poster di SIRENA 50X70 + Il tuo nome nei credits della Graphic Novel.
A printed copy of SIRENA autographed by the authors + Your name in the credits of the Graphic Novel + the poster of SIRENA 50X70

100 € COCKTAIL WITH AUTHORS: una copia stampata e autografata dagli autori di SIRENA + il poster di SIRENA 50X70 + Il tuo nome nei credits della Graphic Novel + Un aperitivo a Milano con gli autori (limitato a 60 persone).
A printed copy of SIRENA autographed by the authors + An aperitif in Milan with the authors (only for 60 people) + the poster of SIRENA 50x70 + Your name in the credits of the Graphic Novel.

130 € PACKAGE x 5 GRAPHIC NOVEL: 5 copie stampate e autografate dagli autori di SIRENA + 5 poster di SIRENA 50x70.
5 printed copies of SIRENA autographed by the authors + 5 poster of SIRENA 50x70

190 € TIMELAPSE PORTRAIT: una copia stampata e autografata dagli autori di SIRENA + Un tuo ritratto in timelapse fatto da Claudio Sciarrone (guardare il video sotto) + il poster di SIRENA 50x70 + Il tuo nome nei credits della Graphic Novel.
A printed copy of SIRENA autographed by the authors + A portrait of yourself in timelapse by Claudio Sciarrone + the poster of SIRENA 50x70 + Your name in the credits of the Graphic Novel.

250 € BECOME A SUPPORTING CHARACTER: una copia stampata e autografata dagli autori di SIRENA + Diventa un personaggio secondario della Graphic Novel SIRENA (inviaci una tua foto e il tuo ritratto apparirà tra i personaggi della storia) + il poster di SIRENA 50x70 + Il tuo nome nei credits della Graphic Novel.
A printed copy of SIRENA autographed by the authors + Become a supporting character in the SIRENA Graphic Novel (send us your photo and your face will appear in the story) + the poster of SIRENA 50X70 + Your name in the credits of the Graphic Novel.

500 € HANDMADE ILLUSTRATION: una copia stampata e autografata dagli autori di SIRENA + Un'illustrazione disegnata a mano da Claudio Sciarrone (Formato A3 a colori) + il poster di SIRENA 50x70 + Il tuo nome nei credits della Graphic Novel. 
A printed copy of SIRENA autographed by the authors + A  handmade illustration by Claudio Sciarrone (A3 format in color) +  the poster of SIRENA 50X70 + Your name in the credits of the Graphic Novel. 

1.000 € TAKE IT ALL! :  una copia stampata e autografata dagli autori di SIRENA + Un'illustrazione di grande formato disegnata a mano da Claudio Sciarrone + una cena privata con gli autori (a Milano) + diventa un personaggio secondario della graphic novel + un ritratto in timelapse fatto da Claudio + Il tuo nome nei credits della Graphic Novel + uno sketch autografato da Claudio + il poster di SIRENA 50X70. 
A copy of SIRENA Graphic Novel signed by the authors +  A large format handmade illustration by Sciarrone +  A private dinner with the authors (only in Milan) + Become a secondary character of the Graphic Novel + A Timelapse portrait by Sciarrone + Your Name in Graphic Novel credits + a SKETCH autograph handmade by Sciarrone + Poster 50x70.

 

Illustration in Timelapse:

 

BUDGET CAMPAGNA

La somma che riusciremo a raccogliere grazie al vostro contributo verrà così utilizzata:

  • 25% - scrittura, disegno e produzione del libro (circa 5 mesi di lavoro per gli autori) + traduzioni per la versione in inglese
  • 25% - stampare 1.000 copie della graphic novel (80 pagine cad).
  • 30% - costi di spedizione in Italia, Europa e Worldwide.
  • 12% - produzione rewards 
  • 8% - Fee Indiegogo

Se la Graphic Novel è il tuo pane quotidiano, se credi nel valore dell’indipendenza artistica, ma soprattutto se il nostro progetto ti ha appassionato, non perdere altro tempo...

Sostienici e diventa un contributore!

Vuoi saperne di più? Scrivici a sirenagraphicnovel@gmail.com

Per rimanere sempre aggiornato sulle ultime novità di SIRENA seguici sui social!

Facebook @topangafilm

Instagram @topangafilm

Instagram @sirena_graphicnovel

BUDGET

The sum that we collect thanks to your contribution will be used as follows:

  • 25% - for writing, drawing and book production (about 5 months of work for the authors) + translations for the English version
  • 25% - to print 1,000 copies of the graphic novel (80 pages each).
  • 30% - shipping costs in Italy, Europe and Worldwide.
  • 12% - production rewards
  • 8% - Fee Indiegogo

If you love Graphic Novels, if you believe in the value of artistic independence, and especially if you're excited by the idea of our project, don’t waste any more time...

Support us and become a contributor!

Stay up to date on the latest news from SIRENA! Follow us on social media!

Facebook @topangafilm

Instagram @topangafilm

Instagram @sirena_graphicnovel

in Milan) + Become a secondary character of the Graphic Novel + A Timelapse portrait by Sciarrone + Your Name in Graphic Novel credits + a SKETCH autograph handmade by Sciarrone + Poster 50x70. Illustration in Timelapse: BUDGET CAMPAGNALa somma che riusciremo a raccogliere grazie al vostro contributo verrà così utilizzata:
25% - scrittura, disegno e produzione del libro (circa 5 mesi di lavoro per gli autori) + traduzioni per la versione in inglese

30% - costi di spedizione in Italia, Europa e Worldwide.
12% - produzione rewards 
8% - Fee Indiegogo

Scrivici a sirenagraphicnovel@gmail.comPer rimanere sempre aggiornato sulle ultime novità di SIRENA seguici sui social!Facebook @topangafilmInstagram @topangafilmInstagram @sirena_graphicnovelBUDGETThe sum that we collect thanks to your contribution will be used as follows:
25% - for writing, drawing and book production (about 5 months of work for the authors) + translations for the English version
25% - to print 1,000 copies of the graphic novel (80 pages each).
30% - shipping costs in Italy, Europe and Worldwide.
12% - production rewards
8% - Fee Indiegogo
If you love Graphic Novels, if you believe in the value of artistic independence, and especially if you're excited by the idea of our project, don’t waste any more time...Support us and become a contributor!Stay up to date on the latest news from SIRENA! Follow us on social media!Facebook @topangafilmInstagram @topangafilmInstagram @sirena_graphicnovel

story:
About the Project

Ad Astra Comix is pleased to announce the publication of its latest title, 'Free Inside: The Life and Work of Peter Collins'. A mixture of comics, art and writing by Pete Collins and those who knew him, 'Free Inside' is a record of Pete's courage and tenacity.

After a troubled childhood, Pete was imprisoned in 1983, convicted of killing Ottawa Police constable Robert Utman. Left alone with his thoughts in prison, Pete felt a terrible remorse for what he had done that would remain with him for his entire life. He spent the next several decades of his life working to heal himself and help those around him. He died of bladder cancer in 2015 after being denied compassionate release so that he might spend his last moments with his family.

Prison confined Pete but could not contain him. He was an advocate for the rights of animals, prisoners and people with HIV / AIDS. In 2008, he was awarded the Award for Action from the Canadian HIV/AIDS Legal Network and Human Rights Watch. He helped prepare fellow prisoners for parole hearings and fought tirelessly for justice.

Although the prison authorities repeatedly obstructed his work as an artist, Pete persisted. His acerbic cartoons about prison life speak to the frustrations therein. His political cartoons skewer the hypocrisy of powerful people. His sketches of birds and other wildlife show his sensitivity and patience.

'Free Inside' is a kind of memorial to Pete - full of his work, his thoughts and the thoughts of those who loved him. It speaks to the failures of the Canadian prison system and the triumph of the human spirit in the face of misery. We are proud to publish this first full length collection of Pete's work and hope that it will encourage people to judge prisoners not in terms of their one mistake, but the whole of their lives and experiences.

-----

All royalties for "Free Inside" will go towards Calls From Home, a program of Prison Radio on CFRC 101.9 FM in Kingston, Ontario.

Not sure if you'll be able to make an order by the end of the month? 'Free Inside' is now available in the Ad Astra Comix online store!

Have questions? Please e-mail us at adastracomix [at] gmail [dot] com.

story:
The adventure begins in this high octane first chapter of Asgard four part miniseries following Desmond Gant that has bonded with Mjolnir and  Muninn while learning to control his new powers. The Inquisition is hot on his heels, attempting to subdue the monster they believe him to be as he searches for his daughter. The action boils over as, gods of legendary pantheons have escaped to earth, on the run from a deadly enemy, seeking a new power, a power that save them all. 

Will Desmond become the Savior of the gods, his daughter and Earth or will he be the Destroyer prophecies have foretold?

Sneak peek of newly finished pages 

 

STRETCH GOALS

Because we have done so well so quickly, more quickly than anticipated im opening the flood gates. Lets go. 

$30000- Upgrade the book with a 12 page back up story about the Inquisition 

$50000- ALL BACKERS JUST RECEIVED CHAPTER #2 OF ASGARD WHEN COMPLETED!

 

Read a little of what we have already created 

COVER 1

 

Cover 2

PAGE 1

PAGE 2

PAGE 3

Page 4-5 

PAGE 6

 

PAGE 7

 

Page 8

 

Page 9

 

These 2 pieces can be had as metal prints 12x18 and 9x12

 

 

ITS BEEN A LONG TIME COMING

 

Over the years we have been scrambling in comics for what we love most; Characters and stories we can relate to. Well look no further than Asgard. We are producing a high quality product for all to enjoy and best yet, its creator owned, with no major company deciding our fate. I'm beyond excited to get every single contributor of this book and the extras offered.

So lets launch Asgard to highest ranks and show the mainstream what solid stories, bombastic art and believable characters can do.

story:
Short Introduction to Kaytea Petro and Gnometown

I am a comic book creator and sculptor based in San Francisco, CA. I lived in Mainland China in 2004-5, making comics there. During that time, I connected with art community there. Because of this, I have been invited by 943 Studio in Kunming to participate in an Artist-In-Residency during the winter of 2013, where I will be creating Volume 3 of my graphic novel Gnometown. Volume 3 tells the backstory of the gnomes' escape from war-torn Europe during World War II, life in China during the war, and eventual arrival in San Francisco in the late 1940's.

Gnometown is the third full-length graphic novel project that I have written and ilustrated. The overall story is a work of historical fiction, telling the story of garden gnomes that live in the abandoned movie theatres in San Francisco's historic Mission District. Steeped in global history, the Gnometown story references American immigrant experiences, and touches on social issues such as sexism, degradation of the natural environment, and inter-generational immigrant cultural conflict.

By helping to fund my Artist-In-Residency at 943 Studio, you will enable me to research and create the full backstory of the gnomes' lives during the war years - a story that mirrors the story of the European Jews that escaped to Shanghai and then inland during the war years. 

If you would like to see more of my work, please check out my website:

http://www.kayteapetro.net/

 

What I Need

943 Studio is a new non-profit art space in Kunming, China. They do not have an endowment to support the artists they invite to be in residence; to participate, I need to fundraise for myself.

I need $6000 to support my Artist in Residency - plane tickets between San Francisco and Kunming (approximately $1600), residence and studio fees (approximately $4400). Unfortunately, China has gotten a lot more expensive than when I last lived there (plane ticket cost has doubled etc.).

Any additional funds over the goal will be spent on research-related expenses: travel costs to important historical sites in the story (such as a trip to document Shanghai's historical quarter), reproduction of historical photographs etc. If my funding goal is not met, I will augment the monies recieved with fundraisers in the SF area before the trip.

 

What You Get by Donating

Anyone that donates to this project will get a credit printed in Gnometown, Volume 3. I also have a made a bunch of perks for funders at all levels. They range from printed matter to origional works of art created specifically for you.

The Impact

Gnometown is the first lengthy graphic novel that I have written that is a work of fiction. Previous works have been autobiographical and taken years to complete (due to the limited nature of time when you're working full time for money). Gnometown is exciting for me as an artist because working in the genre of historical fantasy, I get to create a world and characters from scratch, based on historical research. It has enabled me to see the world differently and allows me to dig deeper into important historical moments.

When all the volumes of Gnometown are compiled into a larger graphic novel, it will be a sweeping story that will cause the reader to think more deeply about the world that is invisible yet surrounds them: what else could be both invisible and in plain view? It opens them up to the magical unknown of the world and consider the possibilities that might exist. The book also references many moments in human history that are largely unknown and unhearalded - the Mission Mile, the persistant water pollution near Jackass Flats, NV as a result of weapons testing between the 1940's and 90's, the experience of the 20,000 European Jews that escaped to China during Word War II as well as many others. It is my hope that the book will encourage people to educate themselves better about these historical moments.

Other Ways You Can Help

I appreciate your help getting the word out about my project. Indiegogo has a variety of share tools to help you support me in the social space.

I would greatfully appreciate if you could use them to help spread the word about Gnometown.

Thank you so much for reading this and considering helping me to achieve my vision.

-Kaytea Petro

story:
We felt this was the case for the comic and art industry.

Having a legendary artist like Jim Lee in your contact list helps alot. As Jim explained his difficulties in traveling with his supplies, we all realized there was a need here. 

So we worked together to create the ultimate travel backpack for artists,
The HEX x Jim Lee Artist Backpack...

 This is why we believe these products are so revolutionary and so needed. We hope you will help us get these products out in the market in a big way.

 MODEL HEIGHT 5'10"

 

STAND-ALONE 11x17 PORTFOLIO

In response to popular demand, we have made the HEX x Jim Lee 11x17 Portfolio available as a stand-alone item!!!  This portfolio is the same portfolio that comes in the Artist Backpack (including the custom Jim Lee Batman sketch lining) , with the one exception that it is in a SOLID BLACK colorway.  

ABOUT HEX:

Music originally brought founders Dan Maravilla and Trent Valladares together as teenagers living in Southern California. Musicians and band-mates they perfected their craft working their way up the local club scene in Los Angeles. Their music style was eclectic - always seeking to create what was not the norm. Their creativity did not stop with sound, however. Both talented visual artists, they would outfit concerts into total sensory experiences by creating and performing original music as well as transforming prestigious concert venues with all-encompassing art installations - to provide a total experience. Clothing and fashion were also on the boys’ radar, often repurposing and making their own clothing and accessories.  

After years in the music and art scene, they decided to launch a small, startup, family fashion business. Early collections gained attention from many world-renowned brands and they started designing and manufacturing for many established labels. This provided valuable opportunities to see inside many great companies and eventually give them the knowledge to be able to launch their own successful brand. 

Enter HEX.  HEX is a creative community that draws from Dan and Trent's years of experience in fashion, music, and art and channels it to equip the next generation of creators through products that empower everyone to explore the outer limits of their potential. Everything HEX does is built on the foundation of its 3 core values of Innovation, Authenticity, and Community.
story_txt:
At HEX, we are all about creativity and expression. In fact, our motto is "Equip The Creators." We are always looking to make people's lives better by focusing attention on often overlooked details or needs. We felt this was the case for the comic and art industry.Having a legendary artist like Jim Lee in your contact list helps alot. As Jim explained his difficulties in traveling with his supplies, we all realized there was a need here. So we worked together to create the ultimate travel backpack for artists,The HEX x Jim Lee Artist Backpack...
